name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-sp-emp-recognition
title: rEmployee Recognition
shortDescription: This SharePoint Framework (SPFx) web part enables organizations to celebrate employee achievements and contributions through a modern recognition system. Users can easily nominate colleagues for various types of recognition and engage with these recognitions through social reactions.
longDescription: This SharePoint Framework (SPFx) web part enables organizations to celebrate employee achievements and contributions through a modern recognition system. Users can easily nominate colleagues for various types of recognition and engage with these recognitions through social reactions.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
